column.name: amendment_by
column.remarks: Comes from the list_options.list_id='amendment_from' and represents who is requesting the amendment

column.name: created_by
column.remarks: The id of the user that initially created this amendment

column.name: modified_by
column.remarks: The id of the user that last modified this amendment

column.name: amendment_by
column.remarks: Comes from the list_options.list_id='amendment_from' and represents who is requesting the amendment

column.name: created_by
column.remarks: The id of the user that initially created this amendment

column.name: modified_by
column.remarks: The id of the user that last modified this amendment

table.name: ar_activity
table.remarks: Accounts Receivable Billing Activity - Used for Claims Processing

column.name: code_type
column.remarks: The code system that is used for this billing activity

column.name: code
column.remarks: The code in the code system referenced in code_type that is the main billing code for this billing activity

column.name: fee
column.remarks: The billing fee that is being requested for payment of services rendered

column.name: post_time
column.remarks: Time of the posting on the date referenced in post_date

column.name: pay_amount
column.remarks: either pay or adj will always be 0

column.name: reason_code
column.remarks: Use as needed to show the primary payer adjustment reason code

column.name: deleted
column.remarks: NULL if active, otherwise when voided

column.name: post_date
column.remarks: Posting date if specified at payment time

column.name: payer_id
column.remarks: The insurance company being billed. If this is self-pay the id will be 0

column.name: verification_id
column.remarks: The eligibility verification record that these benefits are retrived from

column.name: provider_id
column.remarks: The insurance company being billed. If this is self-pay the id will be 0

column.name: encounter
column.remarks: The encounter that this billing record is connected to

column.name: payer_id
column.remarks: The insurance company being billed. If this is self-pay the id will be 0

column.name: path_depth
column.remarks: Depth of path to use in url to find document. Not applicable for CouchDB.

column.name: encounter_check
column.remarks: If encounter is created while tagging

column.name: sale_id
column.remarks: The unique identifier for this record

column.name: drug_id
column.remarks: The id of the drug that was sold to the patient. 0 if the record is not dispensed to a patient

column.name: encounter
column.remarks: The patient encounter which resulted in this drug being sold to the patient.

column.name: sale_date
column.remarks: The date the sale occurred on

column.name: quantity
column.remarks: The number of items sold of the drug

column.name: fee
column.remarks: The total price of the sale for the drug that was sold to the patient

column.name: billed
column.remarks: indicates if the sale is posted to accounting

column.name: distributor_id
column.remarks: UNUSED - will be removed in the future

column.name: allow_combining
column.remarks: 1 = allow filling an order from multiple lots

column.name: allow_multiple
column.remarks: 1 = allow multiple lots at one warehouse

column.name: consumable
column.remarks: 1 = will not show on the fee sheet

column.name: insurance_id
column.remarks: The patient insurance that eligibility is being checked against

table.name: extended_log
table.remarks: Holds the disclosures of EHI made to third parties for a given patient

column.name: reason_date_low
column.remarks: The date the reason was recorded

column.name: reason_date_high
column.remarks: The date the explanation reason for the care plan entry value ends

column.name: id
column.remarks: The primary key which is the same as the forms.form_id column

column.name: last_level_billed
column.remarks: The party for whom payment was last billed. -1=Nobody, 0=Patient, 1=Ins1, 2=Ins2, 3=Ins3

column.name: last_level_closed
column.remarks: The party for whom payment was last received. -1=Nobody, 0=Patient, 1=Ins1, 2=Ins2, 3=Ins3

column.name: provider_id
column.remarks: default and main provider for this visit

column.name: supervisor_id
column.remarks: supervising provider, if any, for this visit

column.name: referring_provider_id
column.remarks: referring provider, if any, for this visit

table.name: form_gad7
table.remarks: Encounter form that holds patient results for the GAD7 assessment

column.name: id
column.remarks: The primary key which is the same as the forms.form_id column

column.name: id
column.remarks: The primary key which is the same as the forms.form_id column

table.name: form_painmap
table.remarks: Patient pain map form. Pain map image for mapping this form is stored in the EHI zip export at images/painmap.png

column.name: id
column.remarks: The primary key which is the same as the forms.form_id column

column.name: data
column.remarks: Data of the patient pain map to overlay ontop of the pain image. Each mapped data element is in the following format x1CoordinatePixels^y1CoordinatePixels^pain1Description}...}.

table.name: form_phq9
table.remarks: Encounter form that holds patient results for the PHQ9 assessment

column.name: id
column.remarks: The primary key which is the same as the forms.form_id column

table.name: form_physical_exam_diagnoses
table.remarks: Physical Exam Diagnosis for a physical exam that was conducted

column.name: id
column.remarks: The primary key which is the same as the forms.form_id column

column.name: response_id
column.remarks: The foreign id to the questionnaire_response repository

column.name: response_meta
column.remarks: json meta data for the response resource

column.name: questionnaire_id
column.remarks: The foreign id to the questionnaire_repository

table.name: form_sdoh
table.remarks: Encounter form that holds results for the Social Determinants of Health Screening Tool

column.name: id
column.remarks: The primary key which is the same as the forms.form_id column

table.name: form_track_anything
table.remarks: Clinical note form that allows clinicians to provide point in time and longitudinal tracking of any data element they configure

column.name: id
column.remarks: The primary key which is the same as the forms.form_id column

column.name: id
column.remarks: The primary key which is the same as the forms.form_id column

column.name: deleted
column.remarks: flag indicates form has been deleted

column.name: issue_id
column.remarks: references lists.id to identify a case

column.name: provider_id
column.remarks: references users.id to identify a provider

column.name: created_by
column.remarks: The user that created this record

column.name: reason_code
column.remarks: Medical code explaining reason of the vital observation value in form codesystem:codetype;...;

column.name: reason_description
column.remarks: Human readable text description of the reason_code column

column.name: cqm_sop
column.remarks: HL7 Source of Payment for eCQMs

column.name: provider
column.remarks: The insurance company that insures the patient

column.name: type
column.remarks: The type of the issue (allergy, medication, etc) where the issue_types.category='default'

column.name: subtype
column.remarks: The sub type of the issue where the list_options.list_id='issue_subtypes'

column.name: title
column.remarks: The human readable description of the issue

column.name: udi
column.remarks: The unique device identifier. Populated if the issue is of type medical_device

column.name: udi_data
column.remarks: The JSON serialized medical device as returned from the https://accessgudid.nlm.nih.gov/api/v2/devices/lookup.json api. Populated if the issue is of type medical_device

column.name: begdate
column.remarks: The beginning date for when this issue occurred as reported by the patient or the provider

column.name: enddate
column.remarks: The end date for when this issue occurred as reported by the patient or the provider

column.name: returndate
column.remarks: UNUSED - will be removed in the future

column.name: occurrence
column.remarks: Comes from the list_options.list_id='occurrence' and is the frequency that this issue occurs for the patient

column.name: classification
column.remarks: UNUSED - will be removed in the future

column.name: referredby
column.remarks: The human readable name of Referring physician and practice

column.name: extrainfo
column.remarks: UNUSED - will be removed in the future

column.name: diagnosis
column.remarks: The diagnosis of the issue. Format is a text string in the format of 'system:code[;system:code2;system:coden]'

column.name: activity
column.remarks: Value of 0 means the record has been deleted, 1 means the record is active in the system

column.name: comments
column.remarks: Human readable additional notes/comments of the issue

column.name: user
column.remarks: The user that created or last updated this issue

column.name: groupname
column.remarks: The user group that created or last updated this issue

column.name: outcome
column.remarks: Comes from the list_options.list_id='outcome' and represents the outcome of the issue

column.name: destination
column.remarks: Human readable name of GP, Secondary care specialist, etc.

column.name: reinjury_id
column.remarks: UNUSED - will be removed in the future

column.name: injury_part
column.remarks: UNUSED - will be removed in the future

column.name: injury_type
column.remarks: UNUSED - will be removed in the future

column.name: injury_grade
column.remarks: UNUSED - will be removed in the future

column.name: reaction
column.remarks: Comes from the list_options.list_id='reaction' and represents the reaction of the patient to the allergy

column.name: verification
column.remarks: Comes from the list_options.list_id='allergyintolerance-verification' and represents the confirmation status of the allergy

column.name: external_allergyid
column.remarks: An identifier for an allergy from an external eRx system

column.name: erx_source
column.remarks: O if the allergy issue originated in OpenEMR, 1 if the allergy issue originated in an external system

column.name: erx_uploaded
column.remarks: O if allergy is still waiting to be uploaded to an external system (such as eRX), 1 if the allergy issue has been successfully received by the eRX system

column.name: modifydate
column.remarks: The date the issue record was last modified

column.name: severity_al
column.remarks: Comes from the list_options.list_id='severity_ccda' and represents the severity of the allergic reaction of the patient to the allergy

column.name: external_id
column.remarks: UNUSED - will be removed in the future

column.name: list_option_id
column.remarks: Comes from the list_options.list_id=CONCAT(lists.type,'_issue_list') and represents the prefilled list option id that was chosen as a template to create this issue

column.name: id
column.remarks: Surrogate id of the record used as the primary incrementing key

column.name: pharmacy_id
column.remarks: The patient's default pharmacy to send prescriptions to

column.name: providerID
column.remarks: The id of the assigned provider to this user

column.name: ref_providerID
column.remarks: The id of the user that referred this patient

column.name: pubpid
column.remarks: The public facing Medical Record Number (MRN) of the patient

column.name: pid
column.remarks: The internal patient identifier used throughout the export to represent this unique patient record

column.name: care_team_provider
column.remarks: List of care team providers where each id is the provider id contained in the users.id. Entries are separated by a the pipe | symbol.

column.name: care_team_facility
column.remarks: List of care team facilities where each id is the facility/organization id contained in the facilities.id. Entries are separated by a the pipe | symbol

column.name: created_by
column.remarks: The id of the user that initially created this record

column.name: updated_by
column.remarks: The id of the user that last updated this record

column.name: care_team_provider
column.remarks: List of care team providers where each id is the provider id contained in the users.id. Entries are separated by a the pipe | symbol.

column.name: care_team_facility
column.remarks: List of care team facilities where each id is the facility/organization id contained in the facilities.id. Entries are separated by a the pipe | symbol

column.name: created_by
column.remarks: The user that created this record

table.name: patient_reminders
table.remarks: Patient Reminders generated from the clinical decision support engine that are sent via a communication medium to the patient

column.name: active
column.remarks: 1 if active and 0 if not active

column.name: category
column.remarks: Maps to the category item in the rule_action_item table

column.name: item
column.remarks: Maps to the item column in the rule_action_item table

column.name: voice_status
column.remarks: 0 if not sent and 1 if sent

column.name: sms_status
column.remarks: 0 if not sent and 1 if sent

column.name: email_status
column.remarks: 0 if not sent and 1 if sent

column.name: mail_status
column.remarks: 0 if not sent and 1 if sent

table.name: pnotes
table.remarks: Patient Messages about the healthcare treatment of the patient

column.name: message_status
column.remarks: Comes from the list_options.list_id='message_status' and represents the status of the message

column.name: filled_by_id
column.remarks: UNUSED - will be removed in the future

column.name: pharmacy_id
column.remarks: The internal identifier for the pharmacy that is connected to this prescription

column.name: date_added
column.remarks: Datetime the prescriptions was initially created

column.name: date_modified
column.remarks: Datetime the prescriptions was last modified

column.name: provider_id
column.remarks: The id of the user that created this prescription

column.name: drug_id
column.remarks: The id of the drug that was prescribed to the patient. 0 if the drug was manually entered

column.name: route
column.remarks: Max size 100 characters is same max as immunizations

column.name: created_by
column.remarks: The id of the user that initially created this record

column.name: updated_by
column.remarks: The id of the user that last updated this record

table.name: rule_action_item
table.remarks: Patient Reminders configuration for Clinical Decision Support individual rule settings

column.name: clin_rem_link
column.remarks: Custom html link in clinical reminder widget

column.name: custom_flag
column.remarks: 1 indexed to rule_patient_data, 0 indexed within main schema

table.name: rule_patient_data
table.remarks: Patient Reminders that the Clinical Decision Support system is configured to run for this specific patient.

column.name: category
column.remarks: Maps to the category item in the rule_action_item table

column.name: item
column.remarks: Maps to the item column in the rule_action_item table

column.name: encounter
column.remarks: 0 if patient attribute, else this is an encounter attribute and references the form_encounter.encounter property

column.name: field_id
column.remarks: references layout_options.field_id and is the unique property name of this shared attribute

column.name: user_id
column.remarks: User who last updated this shared attribute

column.name: what_voided
column.remarks: checkout,receipt and maybe other options later

column.name: date_original
column.remarks: time of original action that is now voided

column.name: other_info
column.remarks: for checkout,receipt the old invoice refno
